snippet: Senator Claire McCaskill's campaign released new ads that feature women who said they were rape victims who criticized Representative Todd Akin for his opposition to allowing sexual assault victims to have access to emergency contraception.
abstract: Senator Claire McCaskill's campaign released new ads that feature women who said they were rape victims who criticized Representative Todd Akin for his opposition to allowing sexual assault victims to have access to emergency contraception.

headline.main: McCaskill Ads Feature Victims of Sexual Assault
headline.print_headline: Senate Race In Missouri: Ads Attack Contraception Stance
